tooltips.+main: The main content of the page
tooltips.+hero: The main image/teaser of the page
tooltips.brand: In case there is no logo defined, this field can be used for any kind of markup like HTML or SVG to serve as the brand of the site
tooltips.checkboxShowInFooter: Show a link to this page in the footer menu
tooltips.checkboxShowInNavbar: Show a link to this page in the main navbar
tooltips.imageAppleTouchIcon: The image to be used as the Apple touch icon
tooltips.imageFavicon: The icon to be used as favicon
tooltips.imageTeaser: The filename or glob pattern for the image to be used as the teaser image in a pagelist
tooltips.metaDescription: An optional meta description to be used for Twitter, Facebook or similar social network cards
tooltips.metaTitle: An optional meta title to be used for the browser title bar and links used on Twitter, Facebook or similar social networks
